data.actual_result: The switch disappear. The only way to unmute it is either by accepting the warning or via the long press menu in channel drawer
data.expected_result: The Mute switch should stay so you can unmute it later
data.short_description: When muting a NSFW channel through channel settings, the mute switch will vanish. Only happens if you haven't accepted the NSFW warning and if you don't have permissions to edit the channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you don't have Manage Channels permissions and where you didn't accept any NSFW warning - Go to a NSFW channel where you can see the warning  - In the overflow menu, open Channel settings  - Toggle on the Mute switch
